title: The Challenge of Measuring Vaccine Effectiveness
author: Dr Lindsey Shultz; The Pandemic Tracking Collective
description: In mid-November 2020, as Covid-19 cases were rising and two thousand people were dying every day in the U.S., Americans needed hope. They got it. Hope arrived in a syringe. Effective vaccines were developed in record time, with the promise of ending the current pandemic. The scientific discoveries behind that quick vaccine development are also [...]
